comment: Base case of the induction in ~ cusgrsize . The size of a complete simple graph with 0 vertices, actually of every null graph, is 0=((0-1)*0)/2. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 2-Jan-2018.) (Revised by AV, 7-Nov-2020.)
